instructions.step: In a bowl, combine all the ingredients apart from the Tenderstem broccoli, salad onions and sesame seeds. Add the broccoli and toss gently to coat; season.

Set a griddle pan over a medium-high heat. Griddle the broccoli in batches, sprinkling each batch with a little water to create some steam. Cook for 6-8 minutes, turning every so often, until tender and slightly charred in places. Arrange on a serving platter and scatter over the salad onions and sesame seeds to serve.
